title: bAravva bhAgIrathi
sahitya:
bAravva bhAgIrathi tOravva janarige


anupallavi

  nA snAna mADuvudu tOravva janarige


caraNam 1    vyAsamuni rAyaru bandu bhOjanakke kareyalu tvaritadindali bandu pAtradali kuLite
    caraNam 2    dAsara nuDi kELi lEsAgi tA bandu grAsakombuva janara pAtradalli pariyalu
    caraNam 3    I mahimeya nODi guru vyAsarAyaru shrIpati purandara viTTalana kaNDantha
